ygData.subject: Re: Looking for spellcomponents
ygData.msgSnippet: ... It depends. In the West Karanas, we re fighting Borer Beetles (level 16 mobs) with a group of level 13-16 people. So far, we have found 5 research
ygData.messageBody:
According to Martin Matthiesen:
> I play a level 29 Magician named Eldran on Cazic Thule. In order to do my
> research I was looking for components. The problem I encountered was that
> the components needed are very rare which I think put Magicians at a

It depends. In the West Karanas, we're fighting Borer Beetles (level 16 mobs)
with a group of level 13-16 people. So far, we have found 5 research components,
three enchanter pages, one necro word, one wizard rune. We're soon to start
on Scythe, and expect them to drop as many.

Our enchanter is already btiching that we can't seem to find antyhing besides
right halves of pages :)

> components. Another suggestion I believe that should be considered is to
> make the necro and mage words look different. I plan on starting a petition

Now that should be.
